inclusion.criterion: baseline studies for determining eligibility within 35 days
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: performance status of 0-2 based on SWOG criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: creatinine <3 mg/dl and creatinine clearance >= 30 ml/minute
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate hepatic function defined as serum transaminases < 2 x ULN and direct bilirubin < 2.0 mg/dl
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: significant co-morbid medical conditions or uncontrolled life threatening infection
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has active multiple myeloma requiring treatment, and meets several other inclusion criteria. However, she has a history of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, which is an exclusion criterion.
